评论详情: i was a little wary, but i’m super glad i gave it a chance. it’s small enough that it’s not too bulky but also big enough to fit my essentials. it’s super cute and perfectly my style. it also feels pretty well made and durable in my opinion. my only very small issue is that the attachable strap is just slightly too short to be a crossbody, but this could be easily modified and is also not a huge deal. overall, totally worth the money and i highly recommend!!
Super cute but the zipper continuously gets stuck.
My princess absolutely loves this purse!!
I loveee this purse. It has enough space for my things when I get out and it goes with almost every outfit!

My favorite bag right now. It's just big enough to fit my phone, lip glosses, wallet, and its super cute, looks just like the picture, really well put together. No hanging stitches and nice fabric. The edges of the stars are not stitched down so keep them flattened during storage.
Cute purse! Very chic and easy to style , spacious and has lots of room for necessities
